text: Inho (munofiqon) hamonhojand, ki (ʙa ahli Madina) megujand: «Bar onho, (muhociron), ki girdi pajomʙari Allohand, cize nadihed, to az girdas parokanda savand». Va hol on ki xazinahoi osmonhovu zamin (va on ci mijoni onhost az rizqu ruziho) az oni Alloh ast, (ʙa kase, ki xohad medihad va az kase, ki xohad ʙozmedorad,) vale munofiqon (onro) namefahmand
